name: agent-council
description: Manage a council of virtual agents that deliberate on decisions using structured debate patterns. Pure local multi-agent collaboration logic with role-based perspective generation and configurable voting methods.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: agent_council
toolDefinition.description: Manage a council of virtual agents that deliberate on decisions using structured debate patterns. Supports creating councils, adding/removing members with distinct roles, running deliberations, and voting with majority, unanimous, or weighted methods.

action.description: create_council (new council), add_member (add virtual agent), remove_member (remove agent), deliberate (structured debate), vote (council votes on proposal), get_council (council details), list_councils (list all)

name.description: Name for the council (required for create_council)

topic.description: Topic the council focuses on (required for create_council)

votingMethod.description: Voting method for the council: majority (default), unanimous, or weighted

councilId.description: Council ID (required for add_member, remove_member, deliberate, vote, get_council)

member.description: Member to add: { name, role, perspective, weight? }

role.description: Member role determining their perspective pattern

perspective.description: Additional perspective context for the member

memberName.description: Name of member to remove (required for remove_member)

proposal.description: Proposal to vote on (required for vote)
